entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Multiple Databases maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 17, 07:00 UTC  -  Nov 27, 07:00 UTC

Oct 15, 00:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our databases offer in cluster eu013.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 17/11/2025 07:00 UTC
End time: 27/11/2025 15:00 UTC
Service impact: The duration of the unavailability of each database will range from one to five minutes.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our databases offer.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Migration cluster006 to cluster106
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 30, 21:00 - 23:00 UTC

Sep 30, 14:57 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Web Hosting offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

entry.title: [GRA1/2][Web Hosting] - Multiple Filerz maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 27, 09:00 - 16:59 UTC

Oct 20, 13:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our responsibilities for Web Hosting filerz, we will be performing infrastructure maintenance.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 27/10/2025 09:00 UTC
End time : 27/10/2025 16:59 UTC
Service impact : Concerned Filerz will be temporarily unavailable for 40 minutes during the maintenance.

List of concerned Filerz:

- filerz969: Cluster026
- filerz1878: Cluster010
- filerz499: Cluster003
- filerz1918: Cluster003
- filerz1809: Cluster031
- filerz1975: Cluster028
- filerz1924: Cluster017
- filerz1988: Cluster030

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing an update for the storage servers hosting your data.
This version brings improvements to certain security mechanisms, as well as some performance enhancements.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Cluster112 incident notification
entry.content:
Oct 21, 06:53 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Web Hosting on Cluster112 has been resolved.

Start time : 21/10/2025 06:11 UTC
End time : 21/10/2025 06:32 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network equipment issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 21, 06:39 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 21/10/2025 06:32 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 21/10/2025 06:11 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Cluster112 was temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Cluster112.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 21, 06:31 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Web Hosting offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the Cluster112.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 21/10/2025 06:11 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Cluster112 is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their websites hosted on Cluster112.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [EU][Collaborative solutions] - Zimbra incident notification
entry.content:
Oct 19, 21:44 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Collaborative solutions offer on the mailstore34 (Zimbra) has been resolved.

Start time : 19/10/2025 14:11 UTC
End time : 19/10/2025 21:20 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 19, 17:37 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : Our technical team is continuing to work on a solution to the issue affecting our Collaborative solutions offer on the mailstore34 (Zimbra)

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 19, 15:18 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Collaborative solutions offer on the mailstore34 (Zimbra)
Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 19/10/2025 14:11 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Zimbra mailstore34 is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their mailboxes (Zimbra).
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 19, 14:54 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Collaborative solutions offer.

Start time : 19/10/2025 14:11 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
